ContentType.Name: TravelRequest
ContentType.Description: Use this form to request approval for Travel

FieldRef.Description: The person who will be taking this time off work
FieldRef.Name: LeaveRequestor

FieldRef.Description: The Supervisor or Manager who will be tasked to Approve this Request
FieldRef.Name: ApproverMngr

FieldRef.Description: When will you be taking time off. First date actually not in office?
FieldRef.Name: StartTime

FieldRef.Description: When will you be back in the office?
FieldRef.Name: EndTime

FieldRef.Description: What is your role for this Event
FieldRef.Name: TypeOfAttendance

FieldRef.Description: What is your purpose of Travel
FieldRef.Name: TypeOfTravel

FieldRef.Description: Place any notes or comments about whether you will need a voucher or need to be reimbursed etc. that will assist us in making this decision
FieldRef.Name: ExpenseComments

FieldRef.Description: Place any notes or comments that will assist us in making this decision
FieldRef.Name: CommentsRequestor
